mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (ID, "START", END, TITLE, TASK_ID, MEMBER_ID, PROJECT_ID) VALUES (SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{start}, #{end}, #{title}, #{task_id}, #{member_id}, #{project_id})
mapper.update: MERGE INTO SCHEDULE s USING DUAL ON (s.TASK_ID = #{task_id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET "START"=#{start}, END=#{end}, TITLE=#{title} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ID, "START", END, TITLE, TASK_ID, MEMBER_ID, PROJECT_ID) VALUES (SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{start}, #{end}, #{title}, #{task_id}, #{member_id}, #{project_id})
